original_title: Red, White, and Blueprints: A Rust Belt Documentary
overview: Red, White, and Blueprints is a documentary film that highlights several of the most innovative initiatives, individuals, and emerging ideas in the Rust Belt, and makes the case for why we still matter as a region. From St. Louis to Detroit, Cleveland, Buffalo, and beyond, the sole intention of this film is to inform and inspire a new generation of leaders to take the vital actions necessary to revitalize our great region.
title: Red, White, and Blueprints: A Rust Belt Documentary
